page.title: 11The Railway
page.content: Duffield has{two}railway lines running through it.The main line from{London}through{Derby}to {Sheffield}and a branch freight line to{Wirksworth.}It also has a local station. Duffield is on the part of the line from{Derby to Matlock}which is testing a new multiple-unit train called{"The {Sprinter". {At Easter 1985}there was a special passenger journey.It was from{Duffield {to Wirksworth.}It was special because only stone had been carried on that line for at least twenty years. There had been speculation that the branch line would close altogether but this one experimental passenger service proved very popular and showed that the line had tourist traffic potential.
